      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int SmartStrategy.alphaBeta(Board b, Mark m, int alpha, int beta, int depthz, boolean myTurn)
      Calculates and returns the value the move based on the assumption that you will always take the best move and the enemy the worst move for you this is calculated with alphabeta pruning.
      int Strategy.determineMove(Board b, Mark m) 
      int SmartStrategy.determineMove(Board b, Mark m)
      Calculates and returns the best move using a thread for every possible move.
      int NaiveStrategy.determineMove(Board b, Mark m) 
      int SmartStrategy.evaluate(Mark mark, int depths, Board board)
      Calculates and returns the value of the board for mark first it looks if a player has won.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> SmartStrategy.getImportantFields(Mark mark, Board b)
      Calculates and returns a map with the height/width of a field, the fields it returns are empty but would win the game for this mark.
